board.headerRFP: Your requirements have been sent to suppliers
board.headerRFPResponse: Your requirements are being published. This process may take a few minutes. Once the process is finished, you can access your published event on your dashboard.
board.headerDA: Your direct award has been sent to suppliers

next.li: Suppliers can read your requirements and ask questions.
You will need to answer any questions by the clarification deadline.
Suppliers can submit their responses to your essential and nice-to-have questions by the stage 1 deadline.
